summary: Patch that adds GtkFileChooser support to gvim (GTK 2.4+)
name: GtkFileChooser
description:
This patch makes GTK/GNOME VIM use new GtkFileChooser for opening and saving files. It requires at least version 2.4 of GTK+ .

Comments are welcome :)
install_details: Diff was made against 6.2.426 but should apply to earlier versions with some tweaking.

versions.release_notes:
* this patch no longer makes changes to configure.in and config.h
 * removed extraneous printf
 * tested with VIM 6.3b
